section.title: What you can do on this section of a card
section.p: The card Murmurs section, in the expanded right panel, shows any murmurs made by project team members directly related to or mentioning that card.

The card History section, also in the expanded right panel, shows a summary of all changes made to the selected card, including who made the change and how long ago the change was made. Click the View link next to a version number to display this card version. When you're viewing an older card version, Mingle shows the version number and how long ago the version was updated. From here you can click to return to the latest version.
section.hint: If your team has integrated Mingle with your source repository, any changes to the source where this card's number was referenced in the commit messages will display here on the History component. You can setup Mingle to view any changes made to this card by any project team member by subscribing to feeds or email on Mingle's History tab.
